task.title: Filtering chats
task.shortdesc: Several predefined filters are available to sort chats.

context.p: Use the Find a person search field to locate a person and open the chat conversation area with that person.

The chat filter provides for filtering active chats. Click the icon for the desired filter. The focused icon turns red. The filter persists until changed.
Displays all chats.
Displays one-to-one chats.
Displays group chats.
Displays meeting chats for meetings you are a member. Meeting chats are distinguishable from others by the icon () associated with them.
Each filter displays the last 150 conversations, listed from the newest to oldest conversation. The number of unread messages is shown next to the filter.
